oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Castner-Knott fashion show models with Mayor Briley, 1965 August 12
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Some of the student models are pictured with Mayor Briley, promoting the Castner-Knott’s “Fashion Happening,” with “60 Models: Guys and Gals from Nashville High Schools and Colleges,” and “It’s a Happening,” at the War Memorial Auditorium on August 16th, 1965. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Briley, Beverly, 1914-1980
Castner Knott Department Store (Nashville, Tenn.)
